item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ DjangoCon US 2016
item.description: Capogiro Gelato Artisans My first ever conference talk, and my first ever Ice Cream Selfie! The rest is history. Trio Gelato from Capogiro Gelato: Cappucino, Pistachio, and Bacio. While my public speaking and ice cream selfies continues, sadly Capogiro Gelato Artisans has since closed down. ðŸ˜¢
